articles.title: 6 Killed In Firecracker Explosion In Bihar Businessman House, 8 Injured
articles.description: Six people died following an explosion inside the home of a firecracker businessman in Khudai Bagh village in Khaira police station area of Bihar's Saran district on Sunday.
articles.content:
The explosion caused a portion of the house to blow up while the remaining part caught fire.

articles.title: Empty chair on stage as Arvind Kejriwal skips event ‘hijacked’ by Centre
articles.description: Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal's chair remained empty at the Delhi government event that he was to attend alongside Governor LG VK Saxena hours after AAP accused Centre of hijacking the programme.

articles.title: Law Linking Aadhaar, Voter ID Challenged In Court, Hearing Tomorrow
articles.description: The controversial law linking Aadhaar and Voter Identity Card has been challenged in the Supreme Court, with Congress's Randeep Singh Surjewala demanding that it be repealed. The top court will hear the case tomorrow.
articles.content:
The Supreme Court earlier said the Aadhaar voter identity card linking will be voluntary.
